entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Queries with `Take` are not cached properly by SQL Server provider #32712
  • Allow conventions to react to sequence operations #32709
  • Different LazyLoad/Proxies behavior with AutoMapper between EF6 and EF Core #32708

Closed

  • Using JSON columns for TPH inheritance #32242
  • I suggest a better way to work with Stored Procedure migrations #32316
  • Consider deprecating keyless entity types in favor of complex types #31439
  • Casting to 'SequentialDataReader' problem #32707
  • Renaming TemporalTable PeriodStart/PeriodEnd maps to incorrect value #32705
  • Investigate benefits of using UnsafeAccessorAttribute in EF Core #32656
  • How to manage adding/removal of properties to a class mapped to Json column? #32642
  • [Component Governance] vulnerability for Azure.Identity 1.7.0 #32608
  • How to remove children when DeleteBehaviour is set to NoAction? #32596
  • Change tracker ignores default value setting on non nullable properties #32565
  • Is it possible to configure to increment a property of an entity every time I call to SaveChages()? #32557
  • More than 2 Unions cannot be translated #32544
  • IMaterializationInterceptor on InitializedInstance doesn't have loaded included properties (child entities) #32535
  • System.AggregateException error after updating .Net and nugets packages #32531
  • EF should probe compatibility_level (for MS SQL) and translate appropriately #32528
  • is efcore 7 ro 8 supports BulkExtensions BatchUpdateAsync in a similar way #32527
  • SQLite Error 5: 'not an error' #32512
  • NullReferenceException in Get-Migration in EF Core 8 #32487
  • Cannot serialize Dictionary<string, string> in a JSON column #30707
  • Feature Request: LINQ to table parameter #13239
  • Test/Cleanup: some adhoc tests that are provider only because hardcoded column types etc can be moved from provider to relational/core #32570
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32714
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32713
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Test for navigation naming from composite FK names #32711
  • Translate to NULLIF #32710

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Add method postfix when rewriting parameters for StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32440
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable (#32345) #32463
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32489
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Infer type mapping suitable for concatenating two results (#32510) #32520
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32523
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Check value converter configuration source when setting element type. #32612
    Servicing-approved
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #32704
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #32703
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #32702
  • Fix to #32570 - Test/Cleanup: some adhoc tests that are provider only… because hardcoded column types etc can be moved from provider to relational/core #32706
    auto-merge

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32598
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32683
    Servicing-approved
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
